mnemonic: general [дже'нерал] общий - («Дженерал - моторе») - общее достояние Америки;
examples: The film is on general release.
The practice threatens to become general.
A general ranks a captain.
There was a general disposition to remain.
General Meeting
This is true in a general sense.
General Executive Committee
Her efforts will redound to the general good.
General Assembly
The general public is in favor of the law.
The opposition are calling for a general election.
At that moment the general hilarity was at its pitch.
Watford General Hospital
Secretary General of the UNO
The General's eyes swept the horizon.
I'm just the general dogsbody around here.
A general colouring was taken from Christianity.
A general state of need exists among the homeless.
He has been breveted a brigadier general.
He was on the general staff.
A general outranks a colonel.
United Nations General Assembly
General Services Administration
It's a good general fertilizer.
The general sent a coded message.
The general commanded a huge army.
A general pattern began to emerge.
a general upward movement of fish
I hate paperwork as a general rule.
We are generaled by an incompetent!
example_translate: Большинство склонялось к тому, чтобы остаться.
Её усилия будут способствовать общему благу.
Широкая общественность — на стороне этого закона.
В тот момент всеобщее веселье достигло апогея.
Тут я просто мальчик на побегушках.
Основная тональность была взята из христианства.
Ему досрочно присвоено звание бригадного генерала.
Как правило, я терпеть не могу бумажную работу.
